name: imagePaste
description: Takes two images and an (x,y) coordinate and draws the second image over the first image with the upper-left corner at coordinate (x,y).

params.name: image2
params.description: The image that is pasted on top of image1.

params.name: x
params.description: The x coordinate where the upper-left corner of image2 is pasted.

params.name: y
params.description: The y coordinate where the upper-left corner of image2 is pasted.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example shows how to copy a small rectangular area of one image and paste it over a larger image.

examples.title: Using paste member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Copy the center of the image, rotate it 180 degrees about its center and paste it back into the original image
